idea-plugin.name: Clean Architecture Feature Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Clean Architecture Feature Generator

Speed up your Android development workflow by generating a complete, layered feature module based on Clean Architecture principles.

This plugin creates the entire directory structure and boilerplate files for the Presentation, Domain, and Data layers, allowing you to focus on writing business logic instead of setting up files.

How to Use

Simply right-click on the package where you want to create the new feature, navigate to New -> Clean Architecture Feature, and fill in the details in the dialog.

Key Features

  • Custom Feature Name: Define the name for your new feature (e.g., "Home", "Profile").
  • Dependency Injection: Choose between Hilt and Koin to generate the appropriate DI modules.
  • Navigation Style: Select your preferred navigation setup, including support for type-safe navigation with NavKey.
  • K2 Compiler Ready: Fully compatible with the modern K2 Kotlin compiler.

Save time and enforce consistency in your projects with this powerful generator.

action.description: Creates a new feature following Clean Architecture principles.
